Features

Residents, businesses and visitors use your website to get things done. Our vision for government digital services makes it easy to get answers, pay bills, report issues and more.

Answers

Residents come to your website with a question. The search-friendly Frequently Asked Questions get them answers quickly.

{{item.title}}

Payments

Online shopping is easy, and your city payments should be, too. You can leverage our default payment processing tool or integrate your legacy system.

{{item.title}}

Social media wall

Highlight every agency's social media presence -- such as Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube -- with a customizable social media wall.

{{item.title}}

In addition to our standard features, ProudCity integrates with (a growing list of) applications, making it easy to add popular and civic-specific services to your digital government platform. See all integrations »
